item.title: HTB Dancing WriteUp
item.description: Dancing – HacktheBox Link to heading System: Windows Difficulty: Very Easy Plataform: HacktheBox Summary Link to heading “Dancing” is a “Very Easy” difficulty machine from the HackTheBox platform. Dancing is part of the Starting Point laboratories. To complete the machine, run nmap to perform a port scan to the IP address 10.129.22.109, the machine proposes the use of a service that is SMB [Server Message Block] so I knew that my scan would have to focus on port 445.

item.title: HTB Fawn WriteUp
item.description: Fawn – HacktheBox Link to heading System: Linux Difficulty: Very Easy Plataform: HacktheBox Summary Link to heading “Fawn” is a “Very Easy” difficulty machine from the HackTheBox platform. Fawn is part of the Starting Point laboratories. To complete this machine run nmap to perform a port scan to the IP address 10.129.219.195, the Fawn machine deals with the “FTP” protocol so my scan to the machine resulted in an open port 21/TCP since I knew that it is an FTP port, use the command ftp [IpAddress] I connect to the machine with a default name anonymous and with a blank password I enter the machine, inside the machine I execute the command ls To list the contents, the search result gives me a file flag.
